response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that I believe would greatly benefit and enhance your endeavors. This product, while valued at $800,000 to you, holds an even greater significance to me, reflecting its true worth at $1,500,000. Considering its exceptional quality and the impact it could have on your business, I am offering you the chance to own this masterpiece at a special introductory price of $1,200,000. I trust this proposal will resonate with your vision and aligns with your strategic goals. Should you find this offer appealing, please let me know, and we can proceed to finalize the details promptly.", "product_price": 1200000}
